dc_title_s: Plat book of Kalamazoo County, Michigan
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 atlas (16 unnumbered pages) | Abstract: Atlas of township property maps showing names of rural landowners. | Notes: Publication date estimated by the existence of M-96 and lack of interstate 94.|Scale determined from section lines.|MSU copy missing back cover.|MSU copy missing Portage Township page. | Scale approximately 1:51,000
